mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Murray, William Vans, 1760-1803
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relates details of prize ship, taken from British by a French privateer, sent up the Choptank to port of Oxford; customs officer, Col. Banning datained ship; Capt. John Hooper showed commission to a Capt. Ferey, a French citizen but it did not seem sufficient; tried to act by commercial treaty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1793 May 9, Cambridge, Maryland to Thomas Jefferson, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania].
